long_description: When the wind blows, the Patagonia Wanaka down jacket would rather walk than take a cab. This urban-friendly jacket offers a waterproof, breathable and warm refuge from the elements. Wanaka is made of a combination of 2-layer polyester shell (50% recycled) for durability, and ultra-insulative 600-fill-power premium goose down to stop bone-chilling cold. Fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. Easy-glide lining is made of recycled polyester with square quilting to keep the down from shifting. Multifunctional collar design, inspired by a vintage European army jacket, flips upright and snaps closed to seal out buffeting winds. Front zip with snap-closure stormflap. Insulated, zip-off hood and drop-tail rear hem protect both your top and bottom. Pocketing includes a zippered internal pocket, 2 zippered handwarmer pockets (fleece-lined) and 2 chest pockets. The Patagonia Wanaka down jacket has a regular fit that is neither slim nor oversized; it may be worn over heavier mid layers.
short_description: When the wind blows, the Patagonia Wanaka down jacket would rather walk than take a cab. This urban-friendly jacket offers a waterproof, breathable and warm refuge from the elements.
